1.name: Well-Prepared
1.desc: Gains <color=#FF9500>200</color> extra Treasure Coins at the start of each battle.

3.name: Refurb Expert
3.desc: Grants a <color=#FF9500>20%</color> chance to upgrade a newly gained Memory Treasure by 1 level.

4.name: Mercenary's Wager
4.desc: Grants one extra stage option to select from on the first level.

5.name: Conservative Strategy
5.desc: Gain an extra <color=#FF9500>1</color> Revival Point at the start of each battle.

6.name: Divine Synergy
6.desc: Triggering the maximum effect of the Gen-zone Bonus only requires 2 Mods of the same Gen-zone.

7.name: Trading Strategy
7.desc: Grants <color=#FF9500>2</color> extra free refreshes for the Dimensional Shop.

8.name: Way to Wealth
8.desc: Gains <color=#FF9500>100</color> more Treasure Coins when selecting the Abandon option.

9.name: Private Channels
9.desc: Increases the item options in Dimensional Shop by <color=#FF9500>3</color>.

10.name: Lone Wolf
10.desc: Recruitment is not available in the battle. Increases the team leader's ATK by <color=#FF9500>3000</color> and the base max HP by <color=#FF9500>100%</color>.

11.name: Pitiless Scale
11.desc: In battle, the ATK of allied Mods is increased by <color=#FF9500>600</color> and ATK of enemy units is increased by <color=#FF9500>20%</color>.

12.name: Proof of Vengeance
12.desc: Increases the team leader's DMG dealt by <color=#FF9500>50%</color> when another allied Mod is defeated. Effect stacks up to 2 times.

13.name: Bounty Hunter
13.desc: Increases Dimensional Terminal EXP and Deviation EXP gained from this round of Dimensional Variable by <color=#FF9500>50%</color>.

14.name: Strike of Inspiration
14.desc: Grants an extra reward selection round from the Treasure Upgrade Stage.
